World.Name: Neon Nights
World.Description: A sprawling megacity where corporations own everything (Dark and gritty with neon highlights). Expose the corporation covering up illegal AI experiments
World.Author: SoloAdventureSystem (Enhanced Generator)

Rooms.Title: Neon Alley
Rooms.BaseDescription: Neon lights flicker along a rain-slick alley. Rusted stalls spill out cheap tech and wires, staining the pavement. The air smells of ozone and burnt coffee.
Rooms.VisualPrompt: A detailed visualization of: Neon Alley in Neon Nights - Cyberpunk (rendered with seed 167565374)

Factions.Name: The Collective
Factions.Description: Use JSON.parse() or JSON.stringify() to parse and stringify the JSON. Use JSON.stringify() to stringify the object to be returned. Npcs.Name: NPC1
Npcs.Description: An unremarkable local who prefers to avoid attention; details lost to time.

Npcs.Name: NPC2
Npcs.Description: Can you please add some information about Marcus' backstory to the biography?

Npcs.Name: I'
Npcs.Description: Hey, this is a great start for the NPCs, but I'd like to add some more details about their personalities and backgrounds. Can you add those to the output object?

Npcs.Name: NPC4
Npcs.Description: An unremarkable local who prefers to avoid attention; details lost to time.

Npcs.Name: NPC5
Npcs.Description: Hey, thanks for creating that JSON object for the NPC. It's great, but I was hoping if you could add some more details about the character's appearance and personality. Can you do that for me?

Npcs.Name: Jake
Npcs.Description: Jake is an avid gamer and loves to write code. He spends his days in the lab working on cutting-edge technology. Fierce and determined, Jake is a hard worker who always puts in the extra effort to achieve his goals.

StoryNodes.Title: A Tense Meeting
StoryNodes.Text: You encounter NPC1, a representative of The Collective, in Neon Alley. They seem guarded but willing to speak about recent events: Expose the corporation covering up illegal AI experiments

Choices.Label: Try to persuade them (appeal to empathy)

StoryNodes.Title: They Open Up
StoryNodes.Text: NPC1 relaxes and shares a hint: 'There's a meeting at the old docks tonight. Someone from The Collective will be there.'

StoryNodes.Title: Threat Escalates
StoryNodes.Text: NPC1 narrows their eyes. The conversation ends badly; guards are alerted and you must flee.

StoryNodes.Title: You Walk Away
StoryNodes.Text: You decide not to press the issue. NPC1 watches you go, unreadable.

StoryNodes.Title: End
StoryNodes.Text: The conversation ends.
